description: Describes the rules packages that are specified by the ARNs of the rules packages.

parameters.name: rulesPackageArns
parameters.description: The ARN that specifies the rules package that you want to describe. (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the rules package.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the rules package.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version ID of the rules package.

nested_items.name: provider
nested_items.description: The provider of the rules package.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the rules package.

nested_items.name: failedItems
nested_items.description: Rules package details that cannot be described. An error code is provided for each failed item.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The status code of a failed item.

nested_items.name: retryable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you can immediately retry a request for this item for a specified resource.
